synopsis.text:
This heartwarming tale follows the journey of Hana, a dedicated college student whose life takes an unexpected turn when she falls deeply in love with a mysterious man, who turns out to be the last living werewolf. Despite his secret, their love remains unwavering, leading to the birth of two unique children, Yuki and Ame, who inherit their father's ability to transform into wolves.

After the sudden loss of her beloved, Hana finds herself in the challenging role of a single mother, tasked with raising two extraordinary children in a society that may not understand or accept them. The urban environment proves to be a difficult place to keep their secret, leading Hana to make the courageous decision to move her family to the tranquil countryside.

Over the course of 13 years, Hana navigates the trials and triumphs of motherhood, watching as her 'wolf children' grow and explore the world around them. Through joyous moments and heart-rending goodbyes, Hana discovers the profound depths of a parent's love. This poignant tale beautifully captures the essence of family, love, and the journey of self-discovery.
